snippet: Syrian rebels on Tuesday said they had captured and later executed several members of a prominent Aleppo family with close ties to the government of President Bashar al-Assad.
abstract: Syrian rebels on Tuesday said they had captured and later executed several members of a prominent Aleppo family with close ties to the government of President Bashar al-Assad.

headline.main: Video Said to Show Execution by Syrian Rebels Stirs Debate
headline.print_headline: Video Said to Show Executions by Syrian Insurgents Stirs Fierce Debate Online
